mdRecord.dcterms:title: Queen Elisabeth of the Belgians and Mrs. Marshall at the Flagpole at Mount Vernon, October 29, 1919
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: National Pictorial News
mdRecord.dcterms:contributor: Elisabeth, Queen, consort of Albert I, King of the Belgians, 1876-1965
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Black and white photographic print of Queen Elisabeth of the Belgians and second lady Mrs. Lois Marshall (wife of Vice President Thomas R. Marshall) stand next to the flag pole on the east lawn at Mount Vernon. The photographer's stamp appears on the reverse. A handwritten caption (by Harrison Dodge) reads: ' The Queen and Mrs. Marshall at the flag staff - the former [Queen] photographing the Mansion.'
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Mount Vernon (Va. : Estate)
East Lawn
